original_text: It is I who made the earth. I created the people who live on it. I hung up the sky like a curtain. I did that with my own hands! I put all the stars in their places. It is I who made the earth.
korean_text: 내가 땅을 만들고 그 위에 사람을 창조하였으며 내가 내 손으로 하늘을 펴고 하늘의 모든 군대에게 명령하였노라

sentences.original_text: It is I who made the earth.
I created the people who live on it.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 위에 사는 사람들을 내가 창조했노라.

sentences.original_text: I hung up the sky like a curtain.
I did that with my own hands!
I put all the stars in their places.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 모든 별들을 그 자리에 두었노라.

sentences.original_text: It is I who made the earth.
